reviews.review: CS to kultowa strzelanka wieloosobowa w którą już się grało w kafejkach po szkole.

Fajna giera, polecam grać bez nerwów bo po co one komu? Nie rozumiem tylko jednego... gra ma tyle lat a nadal ma taka mase problemów. Najczęściej wstępuje u mnie problem z połączeniem do gry(błąd połączenia[nie wystepuje zawsze,ale tylko w tej grze]) albo z wystartowaniem meczu (nie wyskakuje przycisk akceptuj kiedy kazdy inny go ma xdd ). Pomimo tego i banów, które dostaje za "opuszczanie meczy" to polecam, fajna. Kiedyś lepsza, ale nadal da sie przy niej dobrze bawić.
Jogo clássico e muito bacana. Misto de estratégia e habilidade. Recomendo!

Definitely not what it used to be due to the exploitation of Online Gambling, However what keeps this game alive is because of the Enthusiasts of CSGO. A Tactical Shooter which involves strategy, communication, skill, and luck makes this game deserve a Hall of Fame spot in Competitive Games.

cs go more like cs go to the poles

This is one of the best games I think Steam has to offer. I have only been playing for less than half a year but this is already one of my favorite games by far. You can always meet some interesting or funny people and you will never be bored. My one tip I have for people who are just starting to play is to go onto the workshop and do things to practice. Such as target practice. Overall I recommend this game to anyone.

Sistema anti cheats horrível, não banem ninguém, o jogo está infestado de hackers. O suporte do jogo é horroroso você manda email ninguém te responde, só resposta de bot, automatica e olhe la... horrível. Não gastem seu dinheiro com isso.

I would definitely recommend this game to anyone looking for a FPS game that is free, I may have got it before it became free-to-play, but the mechanics of the game have not changed in the slightest. High skill ceiling allows for new and old players making it a unique experience every match.
